content: this crochet eclair inspired by funny flounder from the little mermaid it s very easy and fast to crochet - just watch video and follow instructions materials and tools 1 yarn recommended yarnart jeans 55%cotton/45%pac 160m*50g 174yds*1 76oz in colors sand col a #07 light yellow/lemon col b #67 turquoise col c #81 blue or light blue col d #15 or #75 2 stuffing 3 hook size 2mm /us 4 4 scissors pins markers tapestry needle needle for sewing
